string.value: #b#p9120001##k of #b#m800000000##k has an item she really would love to have. What must that be?

It turns out that the item #p9120001# wants to have is a muffler made out of #t4000066#. A muffler made out of Foxtails. Hmm...I don't get why she'd want to wear a muffler in such warm weather, but I did promise to get her #t4000066#s, She needs 100, so I'd better get started. So, that's #b100 #t4000066#s#k... \n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/100#k
I gave #p9120001# 100 #t4000066#s. Hmmm, but this isn't as much as I thought. Can she really make a muffler out of this?

What do you think? This is a newly-made Kimono. This costs a lot, but isn't it beautiful to look at? The flowers at #m800000000# are generally that of pretty pink. Anyway, I'm pretty sure I'm the only person here that can pull this color off...! But then again, something seems to be lacking here. What would that be...?

Oh yeah! A gorgeous muffler to match this Kimono! If I put them both on, everyone will look at me with awe and reverence. Hey, you. If you aren't busy or something, then can you help me get some materials for the muffler?

Thanks~ You are much more courteous than your looks suggest. What I need for the muffler will be #b100 #t4000066#s#k. I swear, the best mufflers are made out of #t4000066#. I put on nothing but the finest. Hohoho~
What? You said no to a lady? That's so rude!
Hey, you gathered up #t4000066#s like I asked you to~!
Not bad at all~ Well, will these be enough to make the muffler? Hmmm ... talk to me in a bit.
That's not 100! I want 100, #b100 #t4000066#s#k! Do it right!
